comment: I LOVED this class! We had four papers the whole semester and a few quizes here and there. Although her grading was pretty tough on the essays, if you go to the writing center you will make a good grade. She is very personal and I really learned good writing skills in her class. I would say it was my best class so far! I recommend it!

She has a completely different teaching style than any teacher I've had. The papers are easy as long as you go to the writing center and get them reviewed first. Great class, i would recommend it to everyone. (the only down -for me- is that you HAVE to have a facebook for the class)

She gives you the schedule for the semester the first day of class. The entire class stays in touch on our private group facebook page. Only have 4 essays which is reviewed by classmates on peer review days. She grades hard on the essays but you learn how to improve your mistakes.
